title: Atticus Advisory Area Configuration Schema
description: JSON Schema for Atticus business advisory area configuration

version.description: Semantic version of the configuration file (e.g., '1.0.0')

minAppVersion.description: Minimum Atticus app version required to use this configuration

lastUpdated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last configuration update

updateUrl.description: URL where the latest configuration can be fetched

license.description: License identifier for this configuration file

practiceAreas.description: Array of business advisory area configurations

id.description: Unique identifier for the advisory area (kebab-case)

name.description: Human-readable name of the advisory area

description.description: Detailed description of what this advisory area covers

color.description: Hex color code for UI representation (e.g., '#1e40af')

keywords.description: Keywords for detecting when this advisory area is relevant

enabled.description: Whether this advisory area is currently active

systemPrompt.description: System prompt template for AI when operating in this advisory area
